description: REIT offers investors exposure to the Canadian real estate market through a diversified portfolio of real estate investment trusts (REITs), allowing participation in potential rental income and long-term capital appreciation from high-quality properties. REIT offers investors a diversified approach to real estate investing across various types of real estate properties, such as office buildings, apartment complexes, and shopping centers, that can help mitigate sector-specific risks and enhance overall portfolio stability. Designed to provide a consistent monthly income with an opportunity for growth. REIT seeks to replicate, to the extent reasonably possible and net of expenses, the performance of an equal-weighted index designed to provide exposure to the largest Canadian real estate investment trusts ("REITs") (currently, the Mirae Asset Equal Weight Canadian REITs Index).
name: Global X Equal Weight Canadian REITs Index ETF
